item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 预计通过出售股票筹资 16.7 亿美元
item.description: 资金短缺的电动汽车制造商 Lucid 周四表示，公开发行超过 2.62 亿股股票可能会为公司带来 16.7 亿美元的收益。【原文：Cash-strapped electric vehicle maker Lucid said on Thursday a public offering of more than 262 million shares would likely fetch it $1.67 billion in proceeds.】

item.title: 即时观点：欧洲央行再次下调关键利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四今年第三次下调利率，指出欧元区的通胀率目前正日益受到控制，经济前景有所恶化。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates for the third time this year on Thursday, pointing out that inflation in the euro zone is now increasingly under control and the economic outlook has worsened.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济的美国人数量意外下降，但在飓风海伦和米尔顿的影响下，短期内可能会继续上升，从而使劳动力市场的情况变得模糊不清。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment unexpectedly fell last week, but could remain elevated in the near-term amid the effects of Hurricanes Helene and Milton, obscuring the labor market picture.】

item.title: 美国 9 月零售额稳健增长
item.description: 美国 9 月份零售额增幅略高于预期，支持了第三季度经济保持强劲增长的观点。【原文：U.S. retail sales increased slightly more than expected in September, supporting views that the economy maintained a strong pace of growth in the third quarter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行一如预期下调利率，称有望抑制通胀
item.description: 周四，欧洲中央银行今年第三次降息，以应对疲软的经济增长、原本稳如磐石的劳动力市场出现的一些疲软以及消费者价格压力的缓解。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates for the third time this year on Thursday in a nod to sluggish economic growth, some softening in an otherwise rock-solid labour market and easing consumer price pressures.】

item.title: 为削减成本，PPG 将在美国和欧洲裁员 1800 人
item.description: 油漆和涂料生产商PPG工业公司（PPG Industries）周四表示，作为其成本削减计划的一部分，该公司将在美国和欧洲裁员1800人，并关闭多家工厂。【原文：Paints and coatings maker PPG Industries said on Thursday it would lay off 1,800 employees in the United States and Europe and close various facilities as part of its cost-reduction program.】

item.title: 台积电的人工智能前景打动投资者，美国芯片股反弹
item.description: 美国芯片类股周四盘前上涨，原因是行业风向标台积电强劲的销售预期激发了投资者对人工智能应用处理器需求的乐观情绪。【原文：U.S. chip stocks rose before the bell on Thursday after industry bellwether TSMC's strong sales forecast fanned investor optimism about demand for processors used to power artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: Blackstone 盈利超出预期，资产规模创历史新高，交易量回升
item.description: 周四，黑石集团（Blackstone）的关键季度盈利指标超出华尔街预期，这家全球最大的另类投资公司的管理资产（AUM）达到创纪录的 1.1 万亿美元，其基金价值也有所上升。【原文：Blackstone beat Wall Street's expectations on its key quarterly earnings metric on Thursday, as the world's largest alternative investment firm's assets under management (AUM) hit a record $1.1 trillion and the value of its funds rose.】

item.title: 飓风袭击佛罗里达州后房主保险公司的应对措施
item.description: 据分析师最新估计，飓风米尔顿上周横扫佛罗里达州，给整个阳光之州造成高达 550 亿美元的财产损失。米尔顿飓风是在 "海伦 "飓风两周后袭击佛罗里达州的，也是近年来扰乱佛罗里达州财产保险市场的一系列重大飓风中最新的一次。【原文：Hurricane Milton tore through Florida last week, causing as much as $55 billion in property damage throughout the Sunshine State, according to the latest analyst estimates. Hitting just two weeks after Hurricane Helene, Milton was the latest in a series of major hurricanes in recent years to disrupt Florida's property insurance market.】

item.title: 耶伦称美国高关税墙 "被严重误导"，将抬高物价
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将于周四表示，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的为美国经济筑墙的建议将是 "严重的误导"，会抬高美国消费者的物价，降低美国公司的竞争力。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will say on Thursday that walling off the U.S. economy as proposed by Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump would be "deeply misguided," raising prices for American consumers and making U.S. companies less competitive.】

item.title: 美国检察官发现人工智能生成的儿童性虐待图像的威胁正在上升
item.description: 美国联邦检察官正在加紧追捕使用人工智能工具操纵或创建儿童性虐待图像的嫌疑人，因为执法部门担心这种技术可能会刺激非法材料的泛滥。【原文：U.S. federal prosecutors are stepping up their pursuit of suspects who use artificial intelligence tools to manipulate or create child sex abuse images, as law enforcement fears the technology could spur a flood of illicit material.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州房主担心飓风过后保险费用飙升
item.description: 32 年来，Jim Tynan 为他位于佛罗里达州 Ponte Vedra、面积为 1,200 平方英尺的公寓向 Allstate 投保了业主保险。【原文：For 32 years, Jim Tynan had a homeowners' policy with Allstate on his 1,200-square foot condo in Ponte Vedra, Florida.】

item.title: 卡莱尔支持的音乐企业购买兰迪-纽曼的唱片版权
item.description: 由收购公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）支持的音乐合资企业 Litmus Music 周四表示，该公司已获得创作歌手兰迪-纽曼（Randy Newman）的歌曲版权，其中包括他为迪士尼《玩具总动员》（Toy Story）电影创作的歌曲。【原文：Litmus Music, a music venture backed by buyout firm Carlyle Group , has acquired the rights to singer-songwriter Randy Newman's song catalog, which includes his work for Disney's "Toy Story" films, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间交易台积电稳住芯片大船，欧洲央行将放宽政策
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 台积电业绩公布后芯片股反弹，期指上涨；经济数据受关注
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，台积电的乐观预测提振了半导体类股，而投资者则在等待关键经济数据，以寻找有关美国消费者财务健康状况的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained on Thursday, with an upbeat forecast from TSMC lifting semiconductor stocks, while investors awaited key economic data for clues on the financial health of the U.S. consumer.】

item.title: 纽约时报》报道：耶伦警告全面关税将引发通胀
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周四报道，美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）计划在一次演讲中警告说，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的经济政策将加剧通货膨胀并损害企业利益。【原文：The economic policies being proposed by Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump would fuel inflation and harm businesses, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen plans to warn in a speech, according to a report in the New York Times on Thursday.】

item.title: 拜登额外免除 45 亿美元学生债务
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）周四又为6万多名借款人免除了45亿美元的学生债务，使被免除学生贷款的公务员人数超过了100万。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday canceled another $4.5 billion in student debt for over 60,000 borrowers, bringing the number of public service workers who have had their student loans cancelled to over 1 million.】

item.title: 环境组织呼吁 Holcim 在分拆美国公司之前减少碳足迹
item.description: 美国环保组织加大了对水泥生产商 Holcim 的宣传力度，要求其在明年分拆北美业务之前，减少碳足迹，并致信 Holcim 董事长和北美业务的潜在投资者。【原文：U.S. environmental groups have stepped up a campaign to get cement maker Holcim to curb its carbon footprint, writing to its chairman and potential investors in its North American business before it is spun off next year.】

item.title: 美元走强，投资者看空大多数亚洲外汇市场
item.description: 分析师转而看跌大多数亚洲货币，对印度卢比的空头押注创下一年来的新高，原因是对美联储将减少降息力度的预期使美元走强，并使风险较高的亚洲资产黯然失色。【原文：Analysts turned bearish on most Asian currencies, with short bets on the Indian rupee at a one-year high, as expectations the Federal Reserve would cut rates less aggressively strengthened the dollar and took the shine off riskier Asian assets.】

item.title: 中国困境拖累保乐力加第一季度销售额
item.description: 法国烈酒制造商保乐力加（Pernod Ricard）表示，尽管部分由于中国市场疲软导致第一季度销售额降幅超过预期，但该公司仍预计 2024/25 财年销售额将恢复增长。【原文：French spirits maker Pernod Ricard said it still expected to return to sales growth in the 2024/25 fiscal year, despite reporting a bigger-than-expected fall in first quarter sales, caused partly by weakness in China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，现代汽车印度公司将以最高股价定价，以筹集 33 亿美元资金
item.description: 据两位直接了解此事的消息人士透露，现代汽车印度公司将在首次公开募股中把股价定在 1960 卢比，以筹集 33 亿美元。【原文：Hyundai Motor India is set to price its shares at 1,960 rupees to raise $3.3 billion in its initial public offering, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 菲亚特停滞不前，意大利都灵努力避免衰落
item.description: 意大利城市都灵是欧洲最古老的汽车制造厂所在地，它是欧洲大陆部分地区工业衰退的典型代表，因为这些地区的汽车制造商正在与电气化成本、低需求和来自中国的竞争作斗争。【原文：The Italian city of Turin, home to Europe's oldest car factory, typifies the industrial decay that parts of the continent face as its automakers struggle with the cost of electrification, low demand, and competition from China.】

item.title: 台积电第三季度利润增长 54%，好于预期
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商台积电周四公布的第三季度净利润增长 54%，超出市场预期，该公司继续从人工智能应用半导体需求激增中获得回报。【原文：Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC posted a 54% rise in third-quarter net profit on Thursday that beat market expectations as it continues to reap the rewards of surging demand for semiconductors used in artificial intelligence applications.】

item.title: 中国困境拖累保乐力加第一季度销售额
item.description: 法国烈酒制造商保乐力加（Pernod Ricard）表示，尽管第一季度销售额下降了 5.9%，部分原因是中国市场疲软，但该公司仍预计 2024/25 财年销售额将恢复增长。【原文：French spirits maker Pernod Ricard said it still expected to return to sales growth in the 2024/25 fiscal year despite reporting a worse-than-expected 5.9% fall in first quarter sales, caused partly by weakness in China.】

item.title: 聚焦：美国牛群萎缩，澳大利亚牛肉出口获利
item.description: 在一间冷藏室里，大约二十多名戴着帽子、手套和蓝色塑料围裙的工作人员在屠宰后几分钟内就将屠体分割并装箱。【原文：In a refrigerated room, around two dozen staff in hats, gloves and blue plastic aprons carve and pack carcasses into boxes within minutes of their slaughter.】

item.title: 诺基亚第三季度运营利润超出预期
item.description: 芬兰电信设备供应商诺基亚周四公布第三季度运营利润增长 9%，并表示尽管部分业务仍处于市场疲软状态，但许多业务部门目前正在好转。【原文：Finnish telecom equipment supplier Nokia on Thursday reported a 9% rise in third-quarter operating profit, and said many parts of its business are now turning the corner although some continue to experience market weakness.】

item.title: PPA 平台称第三季度欧洲可再生能源发电价格下降
item.description: 价格跟踪平台 LevelTen 周四称，与 2023 年同期相比，第三季度欧洲绿色电力采购协议（PPA）的价格下降了 12.4%。【原文：European power purchase agreements (PPA) for green electricity decreased in price by 12.4% in the third quarter compared with the same time in 2023, price tracking platform LevelTen said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雀巢公司九个月有机销售额增长不及预期，下调业绩展望
item.description: 雀巢公司周四下调了全年销售展望，并公布了九个月有机销售增长低于预期的报告，原因是这家全球最大的包装食品公司在持续提价的情况下未能实现销量增长。【原文：Nestle cut its full-year sales outlook and reported worse-than-expected nine-month organic sales growth on Thursday as the world's biggest packaged food company failed to grow volumes amid continued price hikes.】

item.title: 早间竞价：欧洲央行将减息，市场希望获得下一步行动的线索
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 德国 Vay 公司从欧洲投资银行获得 3700 万美元，用于在欧洲提供远程驱动服务
item.description: 德国遥控驾驶初创公司 Vay 周四表示，已从欧洲投资银行获得 3400 万欧元（3700 万美元）资金，用于在欧洲推广其遥控驾驶汽车技术，并扩大其开发团队。【原文：German remote-driving startup Vay said on Thursday it has received 34 million euros ($37 million) in funding from the European Investment Bank to roll out its remote-driven vehicle technology across Europe and expand its development team.】
